page.title: 13THE SAILING CLUBS
page.content: {Gunfleet Sailing Club At the Gunfleet Sailing Club there are about 80 boat-spaces including the new compound spaces.Also at the sailing club there are 15 sailboard racks.The sailing Club was first started in{1952}but was not called the Gunfleet Sailing Club until about{ {1967}.Before {1967}it was called {Clacton Sailing and Fishing Club}.In {1967}the club split up and some ofthe members formed a new club called {Clacton Sailing}Club.The new compound of the Gunfleet sailing club was built in {1977}.At the moment there are about 80-90 sailing members and since the Gunfleet started there have been about 10 Commodores. The more popular boats at the club are Toppers, Lasers, Toys and 505s but there is also 1 Osprey, 1 Express, 1 Fireball,1 Hornet,2 Mirrors and 2 420s.
